alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL SHELBY, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, AUGLAIZE AND EASTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ohio City to near Ansonia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Coldwater, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Newport, Cridersville, Anna, Fort Loramie, Botkins, Rockford, New Knoxville, Hardin, Moulton, Mendon, Port Jefferson and Osgood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
